nodes.text: Star Wars: Rogue One: AT-ACT Deluxe Book and 3D Wood Model

Star Wars: Rogue One: AT-ACT Deluxe Book and 3D Wood Model is a woodshop activity book for building a model of the AT-ACT as it appeared in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. The set contains a single wood pane with punch-out pieces for the AT-ACT, an instruction guide, and a thirty-two page hardcover book, Star Wars: Rogue One: AT-ACT - Inside the Relentless Imperial Walker. The guidebook, written by Michael Kogge, contains a visual guide of the various Republic and Imperial walker vehicles, their history from the Battle of Geonosis to their appearance on Starkiller Base, and a behind-the-scenes section detailing the conceptualization and production of the Imperial walker for the films, an interview with Doug Chiang, and a guide to customizing the wooden model. It was released on May 23, 2017.
